text: Scott Baio took to Facebook on Monday, April 24, to retract the comments he made that falsely connected his former Happy Days costar and ex - girlfriend Erin Moran ’ s death to drug use. As Us Weekly previously reported, Moran was found dead in her Indiana home at the age of 56 on Saturday, April 22. Authorities later revealed that she likely died of complications from stage IV cancer. Baio, 56, appeared on The Bernie & Sid Show on Monday to discuss his former Joanie Loves Chachi costar ’ s death. “ For me, you do drugs or drink, you ’ re gon na die.
